title: Lies in Ink and Whiskey
description: I’m over men. I’m swearing them off. It’s taken me years to get away from the last one. He left me bruised and battered - in more ways than one. My dislike is as deep as my distrust.Starting my own business, I consider myself fortunate. The thing is, I’ve never been the lucky girl. What was supposed to be a one-time job, turns into nothing but trouble.And that’s something I know a lot about.Lachlan Daly makes me feel everything I swore I never would. One glance into those whiskey colored eyes and I’m lost. His on again, off again desire for me has my head spinning and my pulse pounding.The minute I think I have it figured out, I find myself making decisions that we both will regret.Ink and whiskey have a way of making the truth come out.
author: Leaona Luxx
